channel.title: Quests Question!
channel.description: How do you change what is needed for a quest. Like say u need 1 rune plate, 1 rune legs, and 1 rune helm and you wanted to change it to 1 dragon chain, 1 rune helm and 1 rune legs. How would you do this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 25, 2009, 10:28:01 am[/size][hr]Does any1 know?

item.title: Quests Question!
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

Search in Client class (Client.java) for your playerhasitem method. Then find the item id of that item and should not be hard from there.

Read full topic

item.description:

Depends what source/base your using, And hte codes it uses.
